## \_isControlArray() function

Check if the given object is a valid control array [ControlArraySchema](./dynamic-forms.controlarrayschema.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function _isControlArray(control: any): control is DynamicControlArray<any, any, any, any, any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  control | any | The control object that should be checked.  Returns true if the object is a valid control group, else false. |

<b>Returns:</b>

control is [DynamicControlArray](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrolarray.md)<!-- -->&lt;any, any, any, any, any&gt;
